rules_text:
Space sculptor [i](Exclusion Zone divides the battlefield into alpha, beta, and gamma sectors. If a creature isn’t assigned to a sector, its controller assigns it to one. Opponents assign first.)[/i]
Creatures in each sector can be blocked only by creatures in the same sector.
Creatures in alpha sector lose all abilities and can’t have or gain abilities.
Creatures in beta sector have base power and toughness 3/3.
Creatures in gamma sector have ward {3}.
notes:
Inspiration — Domed cities/experiments/environments, top secret areas, forced separation

Mechanical Uniqueness — Space Sculptor keyword

Gamma — enters with 1/1 counter
